verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֥ים <WH7760> sim set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha thy face אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon; of Ammon וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem. against

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei to the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon, of Ammon שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shim-'U Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֡ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD יַעַן֩ <WH3282> ya-'An Because אָמְרֵ֨ךְ <WH559> 'a-me-Rech Because thou saidst הֶאָ֜ח <WH1889> he-'Ach Aha אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- and against מִקְדָּשִׁ֣י <WH4720> mik-da-Shi against my sanctuary כִֽי־ <WH3588> chi- when נִחָ֗ל <WH2490> ni-Chal, when it was profaned וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and against אַדְמַ֤ת <WH127> 'ad-Mat and against the land יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki when נָשַׁ֔מָּה <WH8074> na-Sham-mah, when it was desolate וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and against בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit and against the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki when הָלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> ha-le-Chu when they went בַּגּוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1473> bag-go-Lah. into captivity

לָכֵ֡ן <WH3651> la-Chen therefore הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> hin-Ni I am going נֹתְנָ֨ךְ <WH5414> no-te-Nach Behold therefore I will deliver לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- thee to the men קֶ֜דֶם <WH6924> Ke-dem of the east לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֗ה <WH4181> le-mo-ra-Shah, for a possession וְיִשְּׁב֤וּ <WH3427> ve-yish-she-Vu and they shall set טִירֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH2918> ti-ro-tei-Hem their palaces בָּ֔ךְ Bach, וְנָ֥תְנוּ <WH5414> ve-Na-te-nu in thee and make בָ֖ךְ vach מִשְׁכְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4908> mish-ke-nei-Hem; their dwellings הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they יֹאכְל֣וּ <WH398> yo-che-Lu in thee they shall eat פִרְיֵ֔ךְ <WH6529> fir-Yech, thy fruit וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah like יִשְׁתּ֥וּ <WH8354> yish-Tu and they shall drink חֲלָבֵֽךְ׃ <WH2461> cha-la-Vech. thy milk

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רַבָּה֙ <WH7237> rab-Bah Rabbah לִנְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> lin-Veh a stable גְמַלִּ֔ים <WH1581> ge-mal-Lim, for camels וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei and the sons עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon of Ammon לְמִרְבַּץ־ <WH4769> le-mir-batz- a couchingplace צֹ֑אן <WH6629> Tzon; for flocks וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> choh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because מַחְאֲךָ֣ <WH4222> mach-'a-Cha Because thou hast clapped יָ֔ד <WH3027> Yad, [thine] hands וְרַקְעֲךָ֖ <WH7554> ve-rak-'a-Cha and stamped בְּרָ֑גֶל <WH7272> be-Ra-gel; with the feet וַתִּשְׂמַ֤ח <WH8055> vat-tis-Mach and rejoiced בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all שָֽׁאטְךָ֙ <WH7589> sha-te-Cha with all thy despite בְּנֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> be-Ne-fesh, in heart אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against אַדְמַ֖ת <WH127> 'ad-Mat against the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

לָכֵ֡ן <WH3651> la-Chen therefore הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> hin-Ni behold נָטִ֨יתִי <WH5186> na-Ti-ti Behold therefore I will stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדִ֜י <WH3027> ya-Di mine hand עָלֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha, against וּנְתַתִּ֤יךָ־ <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Ti-cha- upon thee and will deliver; לְבַג le-vag כלְבַז֙ <WH897> le-Vaz spoil קלַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> lag-go-Yim, to the heathen וְהִכְרַתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH3772> ve-hich-rat-Ti-cha and I will cut thee off מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, from the people וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֖יךָ <WH6> ve-ha-'a-vad-Ti-cha and I will cause thee to perish מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> ha-'a-ra-Tzot; out of the countries אַשְׁמִ֣ידְךָ֔ <WH8045> 'ash-Mi-de-cha, I will destroy וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <WH3045> ve-ya-da'-Ta thee and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an, Because אֲמֹ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mor do say מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> mo-'Av that Moab וְשֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> ve-se-'Ir, and Seir הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold כְּכָֽל־ <WH3605> ke-chal- all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim [is] like unto all the heathen בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit Behold the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> la-Chen therefore הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni I am going פֹתֵ֜חַ <WH6605> fo-Te-ach Therefore behold I will open אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef the side מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> mo-'Av of Moab מֵהֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> me-He-'a-Rim, from the cities מֵֽעָרָ֖יו <WH5892> me-'a-Rav from his cities מִקָּצֵ֑הוּ <WH7097> mik-ka-Tze-hu; [which are] on his frontiers צְבִ֗י <WH6643> tze-Vi, the glory אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz of the country בֵּ֣ית beit הַיְשִׁימֹ֔ת <WH1020> hay-shi-Mot, Bethjeshimoth בַּ֥עַל Ba-'al מְע֖וֹן <WH1186> me-'on Baalmeon; וְקִרְיָתְמָה ve-kir-ya-te-mah כוְקִרְיָתָֽיְמָה׃ <WH7156> ve-kir-ya-Ta-ye-mah. Kiriathaim ק

לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- Unto the men קֶ֙דֶם֙ <WH6924> ke-dem of the east עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- along בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei to the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon, of Ammon וּנְתַתִּ֖יהָ <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Ti-ha and will give לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֑ה <WH4181> le-mo-ra-Shah; them in possession לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not תִזָּכֵ֥ר <WH2142> tiz-za-Cher may not be remembered בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- the sons עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon of Ammon בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> bag-go-Yim. among the nations

וּבְמוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> u-ve-mo-'Av upon Moab אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh And I will execute שְׁפָטִ֑ים <WH8201> she-fa-Tim; judgments וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because עֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> a-Sot hath dealt אֱד֛וֹם <WH123> e-Dom Because that Edom בִּנְקֹ֥ם <WH5358> bin-Kom by taking נָקָ֖ם <WH5359> na-Kam vengeance לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit against the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וַיֶּאְשְׁמ֥וּ <WH816> vai-ye'-she-Mu and hath greatly אָשׁ֖וֹם <WH816> a-Shom offended וְנִקְּמ֥וּ <WH5358> ve-nik-ke-Mu and revenged בָהֶֽם׃ va-Hem.

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD וְנָטִ֤תִי <WH5186> ve-na-Ti-ti I will also stretch out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> ya-Di mine hand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> e-Dom, upon Edom וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> ve-hich-rat-Ti and will cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah at אָדָ֣ם <WH120> 'a-Dam man וּבְהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> u-ve-he-Mah; and beast וּנְתַתִּ֤יהָ <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Ti-ha from it and I will make חָרְבָּה֙ <WH2723> cha-re-Bah it desolate מִתֵּימָ֔ן <WH8487> mit-tei-Man, from Teman וּדְדָ֖נֶה <WH1719> u-de-Da-neh and they of Dedan בַּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> ba-Che-rev by the sword יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <WH5307> yip-Po-lu. shall fall

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will lay אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נִקְמָתִ֜י <WH5360> nik-ma-Ti my vengeance בֶּאֱד֗וֹם <WH123> be-'e-Dom, upon Edom בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> be-Yad by the hand עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> 'am-Mi of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> ve-'a-Su and they shall do בֶאֱד֔וֹם <WH123> ve-'e-Dom, in Edom כְּאַפִּ֖י <WH639> ke-'ap-Pi according to mine anger וְכַחֲמָתִ֑י <WH2534> ve-cha-cha-ma-Ti; and according to my fury וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נִקְמָתִ֔י <WH5360> nik-ma-Ti, my vengeance נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. GOD פ Peh

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֛עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because עֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> a-Sot have dealt פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim Because the Philistines בִּנְקָמָ֑ה <WH5360> bin-ka-Mah; by revenge וַיִּנָּקְמ֤וּ <WH5358> vai-yin-na-ke-Mu and have taken נָקָם֙ <WH5359> na-Kam vengeance בִּשְׁאָ֣ט <WH7589> bish-'At with a despiteful בְּנֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> be-Ne-fesh, heart לְמַשְׁחִ֖ית <WH4889> le-mash-Chit to destroy אֵיבַ֥ת <WH342> 'ei-Vat hatred עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. [it] for the old

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold נוֹטֶ֤ה <WH5186> no-Teh Behold I will stretch out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> ya-Di mine hand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, upon the Philistines וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <WH3772> ve-hich-rat-Ti and I will cut off אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כְּרֵתִ֑ים <WH3774> ke-re-Tim; the Cherethims וְהַ֣אֲבַדְתִּ֔י <WH6> ve-Ha-'a-vad-Ti, and destroy אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit the remnant ח֥וֹף <WH2348> Chof coast הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> hai-Yam. of the sea

וְעָשִׂ֤יתִי <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ti And I will execute בָם֙ vam נְקָמ֣וֹת <WH5360> ne-ka-Mot vengeance גְּדֹל֔וֹת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot, great בְּתוֹכְח֖וֹת <WH8433> be-toch-Chot rebukes חֵמָ֑ה <WH2534> che-Mah; upon them with furious וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, that I [am] the LORD בְּתִתִּ֥י <WH5414> be-tit-Ti when I shall lay אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נִקְמָתִ֖י <WH5360> nik-ma-Ti my vengeance בָּֽם׃ Bam. ס sa-Mek
